author: Andrew O'Reilly
title: GOP lawmakers ask Barr, Pompeo to bring case against China to the International Court of Justice
description: Indiana GOP Rep. Jim Banks sent a letter to Secretary of State Mike Pompeo and Attorney General William Barr urging them to bring a case against China to the International Court of Justice (ICIJ) for the country’s actions during the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
